name: After School
description: YMCA After School program foster each child’s cognitive, social-emotional and physical development through opportunities and experiences which focus on achievement, relationships and belonging. YMCA: 3:30 to 6:15 p.m. Also PTA-sponsored activities such as Spanish, chess, ceramics, yoga, and drama.

cost: This is a fee based service, sliding scale is available with proof of income requirements.
